link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Total non-funded exposures = (Financial & Other guarantees + Share/debenture underwriting obligations + Partly paid shares/debentures + Bills rediscounted + Lease contracts entered into but yet to be executed + Sale and repurchase agreement and asset sales with recourse, where the credit risk remains with the applicable NBFC + Forward asset purchases, forward deposits and partly paid shares and securities, which represent commitments with certain draw down + Lending of NBFC securities or posting of securities as collateral by the NBFC-IFC, including instances where these arise out of repo style transactions + Similar commitments that are unconditionally cancellable at any time by the NBFC-IFC without prior notice or that effectively provide for automatic cancellation due to deterioration in a borrower credit worthiness (i) Unconditional take-out finance (ii) Conditional take-out finance + Undrawn Committed Credit Lines (original maturity of Up to one year) + Undrawn Committed Credit Lines (original maturity of more than one year) + Commitment to provide liquidity facility for securitization of standard asset transactions + Second loss credit enhancement for securitization of standard asset transactions provided by third party 14a) + Interest rate contracts Less than 1 year + 1 year < 5 years + 5 years & above + Exchange rate contracts & Gold Less than 1 year + 1 year < 5 years + 5 years & above + Other contingent liabilities (To be specified in remarks column).

Identity "Value of Total amount reported for book value of bonds and debentures and outstanding loans and advances to and deposits with subsidiaries and companies in the same group = (Outstanding Amount of all values of Appendix I)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total amount of investments reported in shares of subsidiaries and companies in the same group and all non-banking financial companies = (Outstanding Investment Amount of all values of Appendix II)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total amount of investments reported by way of shares, debentures, loans and advances, leasing, hire purchase finance, deposits etc. in other companies, firms and proprietary concerns where directors of the company hold substantial interest = (Outstanding Amount of all values of Appendix III)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total amount reported for loans and advances including off-balance sheet exposures to any single party in excess of 15 per cent of owned fund of the non-banking financial company = (Outstanding Loans and Advances of all values of Appendix I)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total amount reported for loans and advances including off-balance sheet exposures to a single group of parties in excess of 25 per cent of owned fund of the non-banking financial company = (Outstanding Loans and Advances of all values of Appendix II)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total amount reported for investments in a single company in excess of 15 per cent of the owned fund of the non-banking financial company = (Outstanding Investment Amount of all values of Appendix III)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total amount reported for investments in the shares issued by a single group of companies in excess of 25 per cent of the owned fund of the non-banking financial company = ((Outstanding Investment Amount of all values of Appendix IV)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total amount reported for loans, advances to (including debentures/bonds and off-balance sheet exposures) and investment in the shares of single party in excess of 25 per cent of the owned fund of the non-banking financial company = (Outstanding Amount of ‘Loans and Advances’ and ‘Investment’ taken together of all values of Appendix V)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total amount reported loans, advances to (including debentures/bonds and off-balance sheet exposures) and investment in the shares of single group of parties in excess of 40 per cent of the owned fund of the non-banking financial company = (Outstanding Amount of ‘Loans and Advances’ and ‘Investment’ taken together of all values of Appendix VI)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total amount reported for approved securities held towards liquid assets requirement = (Total Amount (at market value or carrying cost as the case may be) for all values of the approved securities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total amount reported for deposits held with scheduled commercial banks = (Principal Amount + Interest Amount)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total amount reported for deposits held with scheduled commercial banks = (Total Amount for all values of the deposits)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total of deduction to the equity capital = (Accumulated balance of loss + Deferred Revenue Expenditure + Deferred Tax Asset (Net) + Other Intangible Assets + Others) for Core Investment Companies" do not tally.
